title: KUBEARMOR: Unleashing the Power of Kubernetes Security
description: KubeArmor is a cloud-native runtime security enforcement system that restricts the behavior (such as process execution, file access, and networking operations) of pods, containers, and nodes (VMs) at the system level.

steps.title: Step 3: Checking apt/apt-get command before policy enforcement
